taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField:
The *Equal Status Act 2000* makes it illegal to *discriminate* against an *individual* on the grounds of *gender*, marital status, family status, age, disability, race, *sexual orientation*, religious beliefs, or membership of the *traveller* community. 
Organisations must ensure that they do not discriminate against any individual or *group* of customers. *Discrimination* can take a number of *ways*. A customer may be discriminated against by being denied *entry* into a building or premises because of a lack of *accessibility* ramps. Customers can be discriminated against by a lack of *provision* of products or services to cater for their *specific* needs.
